factoryName.metadata: Nombre de instancia de Data Factory

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select b.CODI_BIBLIOTECA,'IND_1_3' as CODI_INDICADOR,
(coalesce(datediff(MINUTE,cast(dl_mati_ini as time),cast(isnull(dl_mati_fi,dl_tarda_fi) as time)),0)
+ coalesce(datediff(MINUTE,cast(dl_tarda_ini as time),cast(dl_tarda_fi as time)),0)
 
+ coalesce(datediff(MINUTE,cast(dt_mati_ini as time),cast(isnull(dt_mati_fi,dt_tarda_fi) as time)),0) 
+ coalesce(datediff(MINUTE,cast(dt_tarda_ini as time),cast(dt_tarda_fi as time)),0)

+ coalesce(datediff(MINUTE,cast(dc_mati_ini as time),cast(isnull(dc_mati_fi,dc_tarda_fi) as time)),0)
+ coalesce(datediff(MINUTE,cast(dc_tarda_ini as time),cast(dc_tarda_fi as time)),0)

+ coalesce(datediff(MINUTE,cast(dj_mati_ini as time),cast(isnull(dj_mati_fi,dj_tarda_fi) as time)),0) 
+ coalesce(datediff(MINUTE,cast(dj_tarda_ini as time),cast(dj_tarda_fi as time)),0)

+ coalesce(datediff(MINUTE,cast(dv_mati_ini as time),cast(isnull(dv_mati_fi,dv_tarda_fi) as time)),0) 
+ coalesce(datediff(MINUTE,cast(dv_tarda_ini as time),cast(dv_tarda_fi as time)),0)

+ coalesce(datediff(MINUTE,cast(ds_mati_ini as time),cast(isnull(ds_mati_fi,ds_tarda_fi) as time)),0) 
+ coalesce(datediff(MINUTE,cast(ds_tarda_ini as time),cast(ds_tarda_fi as time)),0)

+ coalesce(datediff(MINUTE,cast(dg_mati_ini as time),cast(isnull(dg_mati_fi,dg_tarda_fi) as time)),0) 
+ coalesce(datediff(MINUTE,cast(dg_tarda_ini as time),cast(dg_tarda_fi as time)),0))

/60.0
 as IND_VALOR
from [DIB_STG].[STG_DIB_DIM_HORARIS_HIVERN] h
join [BEG_DM].[DM_BEG_DIM_BIBLIOTEQUES] b on h.id_biblioteca=b.id_biblioteca

ifTrueActivities.name: PL_BEG_FACT_ODS2
ifTrueActivities.description: Une todos los indicadores base en una sola tabla

ifTrueActivities.name: PL_BEG_FACT_ODS3
ifTrueActivities.description: Pone indicadores que no se han calculado para las bibliotecas con un NULL

ifTrueActivities.name: PL_BEG_FACT_ODS4
ifTrueActivities.description: Calcula indicadores a partir de los base

ifTrueActivities.name: PL_BEG_FACT_ODS5
ifTrueActivities.description: Une los prestamos anuales con los dems y aade el AGENCY como codigo.

sqlReaderQuery.value:
@CONCAT('select COUNT(error) AS NUM_ERRORS from [BEG_STG].[LOGS_BEG]
where error not like ''%sftppathnotfound%'' AND ERROR IS NOT NULL AND DATA_INSERCIO < ''',activity('DATA_INICIO').output.firstRow.DATA_INICIO,'''')

properties.description: Ejecuta cada da el proceso de carga de data entry a mes vencido.
Carga todos los da 3 de mes las tablas de DIBICA y TERRITORIAL
Ejecuta cada da 28 de mes, el pipeline de data entry del ltimo mes.

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select MAX(DATA_PERIODE) AS MAX_DATA_BAIXES FROM [BEG_DM].[DM_BEG_FACT_INDICADORS]
WHERE CODI_INDICADOR = 'IND_3_10011';

properties.description: Ejecuta cada da 4 de mes el proceso de carga de ficheros.
Ejecuta el mes de septiembre las bajas del primer semestre y el mes de marzo las bajas del segundo semestre del ao anterior.
